review_text: I got this power to sleep because it does not contain melatonin which can give you nightmares if you take too much. I‚Äôll mix it with the other PTS to reduce the melatonin. This one contains California poppy that helps you sleep for an alternative to the melatonin. It seems like a quality brand that provides liquid capsules instead of dry. I feel liquid is fresher and contains a more efficacious delivery of the constituents-vitamins/supplements ingredients. The size is not huge-50 pills which they want you to take 3. I‚Äôll take 2, and one of the other ‚Äòpower to sleep‚Äô (with melatonin) capsules to round it out. I got it on sale 28% off so bought 3! I should have enough to last for a while till the next sale.

I like this ‚Äúpower to sleep‚Äù by Irwin Naturals because it contains California poppy which is a gentle relaxer. I believe it also is a mild pain reliever because it‚Äôs related to poppies. I will usually take one of these with the other Irwin power to sleep that has melatonin included in it. I mix the two because I don‚Äôt like nightmares from too much melatonin. The size is a little smaller than the other style but I like the poppy ingredient so I ordered 2 bottles to balance the other P.T.S. They are also soft gels so works faster than tablets. Irwin I believe is a good quality supplement so I order several different kinds.

Like many I have trouble staying asleep at night, and this product has aided my ability to stay asleep and avoid the 3:00 am wake up.  I can't write enough nice things about this sleep aid other than to say this comes with my full recommendation.

review_title: Gel cap is big, but effective
review_text: Gel cap is big, but since it is a gel cap, not too hard to swallow.  taken along with L-theanine and Gaba, seems to help me get good night's sleep.

I have used Irwin Naturals Power to sleep pm before; I was thrilled when I realized it comes in a melatonin free formula. I have a provider who doesn't want me to take too much melatonin in my sleep products because it's actually a hormone. I believe Irwins' are high quality products, I like what all of these specific ingredients do and there's no taste issues in a gel cap. The benefit overall is a product that works.

I guess I relied on sleeping pills prescribed by my doctor for a very long time that I thought why not try homeopathy.   This isn't drug based so if you are looking for instant sleep after a day of stress, this is not IT.  You have to relax your mind and body first for this to work.
I take two of these every night before bed. Then I take another that has melatonin in it!
It's a bit pricey but I have been looking for something with none, or less melatonin. It works for me! I am repurchasing it now
Apparently good quality ingredients and dosage but it didn't work for me.

Works, and it does not include Valerian that I cannot use. 
Price is little bit high.
Just started using so not fair to evaluate. My sleep was scattered and not helpful. Hope to use for a week, at least, to be fair. Will let you know..............

review_title: Looked promising but didn' work for me
review_text: I was originally looking for a formula that had California Poppy in it but settled for this as the herbal ingredients looked promising. For whatever reason it did not work well for me at all.  I suggest taking this well in advance of when you need to be asleep.  I was taking it approximately 30 minutes before and it didn't seem to kick in at all till a couple of hours later, plus I still woke up after a few hours sleep.
